chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
s: SF_seq
x: R

Goal:
SF_h s <= x -> pointed_subdiv s -> pointed_subdiv (SF_cut_down s x)

Premises:
SF_cut_down = fun (sf : SF_seq) (x : R) => let s := seq_cut_down ((SF_h sf, SF_h sf) :: SF_t sf) x in {| SF_h := fst (head (SF_h sf, SF_h sf) s); SF_t := behead s |} : SF_seq -> R -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [_ R_scope]
SF_h = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => let (SF_h, _) := s in SF_h : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
pointed_subdiv = fun ptd : SF_seq => forall i : nat, (i < SF_size ptd)%nat -> nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_ly ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) (S i) : SF_seq -> Prop
SF_cat_pointed : forall x y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> pointed_subdiv x -> pointed_subdiv y -> pointed_subdiv (SF_cat x y)
ptd_cons : forall (h : R * R) (s : SF_seq), pointed_subdiv (SF_cons h s) -> pointed_subdiv s
SF_cut_down_step : forall (s : SF_seq) (x eps : R), SF_h s <= x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> seq_step (SF_lx s) < eps -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_cut_down s x)) < eps
SF_cut_up_step : forall (s : SF_seq) (x eps : R), SF_h s <= x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> seq_step (SF_lx s) < eps -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_cut_up s x)) < eps
ptd_sort : forall ptd : SF_seq, pointed_subdiv ptd -> SF_sorted Rle ptd
ptd_sort' : forall ptd : SF_seq, pointed_subdiv ptd -> sorted Rle (SF_ly ptd)
SF_cut_up = fun (sf : SF_seq) (x : R) => let s := seq_cut_up ((SF_h sf, SF_h sf) :: SF_t sf) x in {| SF_h := fst (head (SF_h sf, SF_h sf) s); SF_t := behead s |} : SF_seq -> R -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [_ R_scope]
rev_rcons : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (x : T), rev (rcons s x) = x :: rev s
sumbool_rec : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Set), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
rcons_ind : forall P : seq ?T -> Type, P [::] -> (forall (s0 : seq ?T) (t : ?T), P s0 -> P (rcons s0 t)) -> forall s : seq ?T, P s where ?T : [s : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
rcons_dec : forall P : seq ?T -> Type, P [::] -> (forall (s0 : seq ?T) (t : ?T), P (rcons s0 t)) -> forall s : seq ?T, P s where ?T : [s : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
sumor_rec : forall (A : Type) (B : Prop) (P : A + {B} -> Set), (forall a : A, P (inleft a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inright b)) -> forall s : A + {B}, P s
SF_rcons_ind : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (s0 : SF_seq) (t : R * ?T), P s0 -> P (SF_rcons s0 t)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [s : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
SF_cons_ind : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (h : R * ?T) (s0 : SF_seq), P s0 -> P (SF_cons h s0)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [s : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
sigT_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (P0 : {x : A & P x} -> Type), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (existT P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A & P x}, P0 s
sig_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
SF_cons_dec : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (h : R * ?T) (s0 : SF_seq), P (SF_cons h s0)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [s : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
SF_rcons_dec : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (s0 : SF_seq) (t : R * ?T), P (SF_rcons s0 t)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [s : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
FTC_P1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall x : R, a <= x -> x <= b -> Riemann_integrable f a x
size_rcons : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (x : T), size (rcons s x) = S (size s)
SF_lx = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_h s :: unzip1 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
continuity_implies_RiemannInt : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> Riemann_integrable f a b
StepFun_P37 : forall (a b : R) (f g : StepFun a b), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> RiemannInt_SF f <= RiemannInt_SF g
SF_cons = fun (T : Type) (h : R * T) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := fst h; SF_t := (SF_h s, snd h) :: SF_t s |} : forall T : Type, R * T -> SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
RiemannInt_P19 : forall (f g : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr1 : Riemann_integrable f a b) (pr2 : Riemann_integrable g a b), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> RiemannInt pr1 <= RiemannInt pr2
seq_cut_up = fix seq_cut_up (s : seq (R * R)) (x : R) {struct s} : seq (R * R) := match s with | [::] => [:: (x, x)] | h :: t => if Rle_dec (fst h) x then seq_cut_up t x else [:: (x, x), (fst h, Rmax (snd h) x) & t] end : seq (R * R) -> R -> seq (R * R) Argument scopes are [seq_scope R_scope]
size_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1), size [seq f i | i <- s] = size s
foldr = fun (T R : Type) (f : T -> R -> R) (z0 : R) => fix foldr (s : seq T) : R := match s with | [::] => z0 | x :: s' => f x (foldr s') end : forall T R : Type, (T -> R -> R) -> R -> seq T -> R Arguments T, R are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _ seq_scope]
seq_step = fun s : seq R => foldr Rmax 0 (pairmap (fun x y : R => Rabs (y - x)) (head 0 s) (behead s)) : seq R -> R Argument scope is [seq_scope]
cos_incr_1 : forall x y : R, PI <= x -> x <= 2 * PI -> PI <= y -> y <= 2 * PI -> x <= y -> cos x <= cos y

```coq
```coq
intros s x Hle ptd.
assert (Hle1: SF_h s <= x).
{ apply Hle. }
assert (Hle2: x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s)).
{ apply Hle. }
assert (Hptd: pointed_subdiv s).
{ assumption. }
unfold SF_cut_down in *.
destruct (seq_cut_down ((SF_h s, SF_h s) :: SF_t s) x) as [h [s'] eq].
unfold SF_h in eq.
rewrite <- eq.
assert (eq1: h = fst (head (SF_h s, SF_h s) (seq_cut_down ((SF_h s, SF_h s) :: SF_t s) x))).
{ apply eq. }
assert (eq2: snd (head (SF_h s, SF_h s) (seq_cut_down ((SF_h s, SF_h s) :: SF_t s) x)) = last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s)).
{ apply eq. }
unfold SF_h, SF_t in eq2.
rewrite <- eq1 in eq2.
unfold seq_cut_up in eq2.
assert (eq3: seq_cut_up ((SF_h s, SF_h s) :: SF_t s) x = [::] ++ [:: (x, x)] ++ (seq_cut_up ((SF_h s, SF_h s) :: SF_t s) x)).
{ apply eq2. }
rewrite <- eq3.
assert (eq4: pointed_subdiv (SF_cons (fst (head (SF_h s, SF_h s) (seq_cut_down ((SF_h s, SF_h s) :: SF_t s) x)), snd (head (SF_h s, SF_h s) (seq_cut_down ((SF_h s, SF_h s) :: SF_t s) x))) (behead (seq_cut_down ((SF_h s, SF_h s) :: SF_t s) x)))).
{ apply ptd_cons. assumption. }
apply SF_cat_pointed with (y := SF_cons (fst (head (SF_h s, SF_h s) (seq_cut_down ((SF_h s, SF_h s) :: SF_t s) x)), snd (head (SF_h s, SF_h s) (seq_cut_down ((SF_h s, SF_h s) :: SF_t s) x))) (behead (seq_cut_down ((SF_h s, SF_h s) :: SF_t s) x))) (x := SF_cut_down s x).
unfold SF_cut_down in *.
rewrite eq.
auto.
Qed.```
